### Feature Description
What new feature would you like to add?

### Use Case
What problem does this feature solve for you? (e.g. When scanning projects in bulk, I need to export reports quickly, but currently I can only export them one by one)

### Reference Example (Optional)
Are there similar features in other tools that can be referenced? (Screenshot is preferred!)
